Comment.Language: The response to the Catholic Epistle is chanted. The response to the Catholic Epistle hymn is chanted before the reading of the Catholic Epistle:

Text.Language: A petj/k e~bol n~je pic~mou tou logou Pefiwt i~af[icarx hwc rwmi n~telioc.
Perfect is the blessing, of the Word of the Father, who came and was incarnate as a perfect man.

The slaughtered One was seen. The slaughtered One is present among you. The slaughtered One is crucified on the Cross.

Comment.Language: In the presence of a metropolitan or a bishop:

Text.Language: Ere pic~mou m~pene~pickopoc (m~penm/tropolit/c) (2) n~iwt ettai/out abba (nim).
The blessing of our Bishop (Metropolitan) (2), the honorable father Abba (â€¦).
